title: They would elope
brief_description: A father tricks his daughter into eloping with her lover and then celebrates her wedding upon their return. Cast includes Billy Quirk, Mary Pickford, James Kirkwood, Kate Bruce, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
